title: Cryptology
description:
Prerequisite: Must have completed two 400-level MATH courses (not to include MATH 461, 478, and 480's) with a minimum grade of C-. Or minimum grade of C- in CMSC351 and CMSC330; and permission of CMNS-Mathematics department.
Also offered as: CMSC456.
Credit only granted for: MATH456 or CMSC456.
